alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Georgetown, southwestern Horry and south central Marion Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plantersville, or 9 miles west of Murrells Inlet, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Surfside Beach, Socastee, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Red Hill, Burgess, Bucksville, Oatland, Bucksport, Dongola, Plantersville, Yauhannah, Coastal Carolina University and Waccamaw Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion
